name: Project Ocean
description:
Project Ocean are a indie boat simulator game, specialized in an arcade gameplay. Drive a boat in three map: A lake (Peace), the ocean (Normal) and the ocean during a Thunderstorm (Hard)

Project Ocean is and will be updated every month with new content such as new boats, new maps and new systems

Game Discord: https://discord.gg/26YmMuaUJ7

Actuals Features:

  • Start and Stop motor (with sound)
  • Boats crack details
  • Speed Regulator
  • Lightning System
  • Horn System
  • Shink System

Game Key:

KEYFunctionsAvailableWASDMove the boat YesEStart/Stop MotorYesMShow minimapYesRSpeed RegulatorYesLTurn on/off LightYesHHornYesVChange BoatsNoUShow Commands List MenuYesNDisplay Network Info*No

*This will be available when the multiplayer system will be released

Developer: Léo Berteloot 

Studio: Palm Concept Studio
